definition: n. (usually plural) the components needed for making or doing something

example_sentences.cn: 这种木料松，做家具不合适。
example_sentences.en: The wood is too soft for making furniture.

example_sentences.cn: 龟壳潜入泥中，使它几乎不被看见。
example_sentences.en: The turtle's shell blended into the mud, making it almost invisible.

example_sentences.cn: 但是绝不是直接成为为你做决定的那个人。
example_sentences.en: But it is not the one of making the decisions for your.

example_sentences.cn: 通过使这个过滤器变成可选的，您就能够选择启用两个过滤器、只启用一个过滤器或者不启用过滤器。
example_sentences.en: By making the filter optional, you can choose to filter on both filters, only one filter, or choose not to filter at all.

example_sentences.cn: 但是，如果你在内容上做了很多投资，那就不需要再遮遮掩掩。
example_sentences.en: But if you are making the investment in the content, do not hide it away.

example_sentences.cn: 你知道你正在做什么工作，但你知道你还可以做什么工作吗？
example_sentences.en: You know what you make. But do you know what you could be making?

example_sentences.cn: 她不动声色地让我们在毫无压力、自由自在的感觉中，忘记了即将来临的考试。
example_sentences.en: By making us forget about the upcoming test, she allowed us to come in with no stress whatsoever.

example_sentences.cn: 那些像我们一样喜欢所有决定的制定都有透明度的人，十分希望看到所有的图片都能公布。
example_sentences.en: Those of us who like to see transparency in all decision making would like to have all the photos released.

example_sentences.cn: 您要明白您将制作什么样的官方的构件作为这是发布的一部分。
example_sentences.en: You need to understand what official builds you will be making as part of the official release.

example_sentences.cn: “但是如果我们坚称一切为世界杯而做的准备都能按时完成，不论是什么，我们就是冒着做傻事的风险”。他补充。
example_sentences.en: “But if we persist in saying that everything will be ready for the World Cup, no matter what, we risk making fools of ourselves, ” he says.

example_sentences.cn: 要使得脚本无侵入，接下来的步骤是决定何时以及如何包含它们。
example_sentences.en: The next step in making your scripts unobtrusive is deciding when and how to include them.

example_sentences.cn: 组合方法的思想是你所有的方法中每个方法应该做也只能做一种事情，尽量使他们短小精悍。
example_sentences.en: Composed method encapsulates the idea that all your methods should do one and only one thing, making them as small as possible.

example_sentences.cn: 对白宫来说，他的宝贵之处并不在于更灵活的理解这个国家，而是他不会制造麻烦。
example_sentences.en: He was valuable to the White House not for a supple understanding of the country, but for not making trouble.

example_sentences.cn: 你应该把全家人带去饭馆吃上一顿80美元的大餐，而不是在家自己做一顿吗？
example_sentences.en: Should you take your family out for an $80 meal instead of making one at home?

example_sentences.cn: 不管食物的多样性，无论如何，从茶到葡萄干，日本人成功的让每一样他们吃的东西吃起来像熏牛肉。
example_sentences.en: Despite this variety of foods, however, the Japanese have succeeded in making every single thing they eat, from tea to plums, taste like smokey beef.

example_sentences.cn: 但是我仍然想说的是，在你做决定之前一定要好好想清楚。
example_sentences.en: But I still wanna say before making any decision, you have to think it over.

example_sentences.cn: 在本文中描述的功能改善，提高了序列图的可用性，因此使得您可以更加容易的编辑和变更您的图表。
example_sentences.en: The enhancements described in this article improve the usability of the sequence diagram, thus making it easier for you to edit and modify your diagrams.

example_sentences.cn: 如果你想要看到中国正在形成的未来，你就要实地访问它。
example_sentences.en: If you want to see its future in the making, you really should visit.

example_sentences.cn: 在你的世界里要有兴趣地与制造商和消费者分享你的友好，你就要考虑怎样使自己能极易地处理到。
example_sentences.en: In the interest of sharing the aloha with all the makers and consumers in your world, consider making it excruciatingly easy to deal with you.

example_sentences.cn: 这可以得到的一个不幸的结论是,作为一个领导者，做决定，当机立断是,你很少会得到完全的信息。
example_sentences.en: One unfortunate conclusion of all this about making decisions and decisiveness as a leader is that very rarely you have a complete knowledge.

example_sentences.cn: 我的工作通常是在向前进展之前，在核心组件做一个小的变化然后测试新的代码。
example_sentences.en: I usually work by making small changes to the code and then testing the new code before I move on.

example_sentences.cn: 我们是否在制作类似这样工具时学会了彼此用语言交流？
example_sentences.en: Was it in making things like this that we learned how to talk to one another?

example_sentences.cn: 这样做的好处是，在同样可以指明什么文本没有翻译的同时，保持了一定程度的可读性。
example_sentences.en: This has the advantage of retaining some level of readability while making it equally clear what text has not been translated.

example_sentences.cn: 你不会被侧边栏，通知或是额外的导航项目而打扰——在页面上只有很少的东西，吸引你的注意力，使人轻而易举地找到下一步的去向。
example_sentences.en: You’re not distracted by sidebars, notices or extra navigation items — there are only a few items on the page, focusing your attention and making the decision of where to go next easier .

example_sentences.cn: 为了保留香肠和法律的尊严，不能让人们看到它们的制作过程。
example_sentences.en: To retain respect for sausages and laws, one must not watch them in the making.

example_sentences.cn: 为了保留香肠和法律的尊严，不能让人们看到它们的制作过程。
example_sentences.en: To retain respect for sausages and laws, one must not watch them in the making.

word_group.cn: 决议过程，决策过程；决定过程
闭合时间；投入时间；接通时间

translation: n. 制造, (手工)制造业, 制作, 形成, 发展, 要素, 内在因素, 赚头, 制造物
